resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74606</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74606</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40c87b29-c300-454b-2e6a-fdaefe8b1490#1#7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Támpontok</string>
            <string language="en">Bases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterseiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Basi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βάσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bases</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A korszak teológiájának, filozófiájának fontosabb kérdéskörei, a világi kultúra jellege: a lovagénekek. Az egyházi liturgia, irodalom és zene kapcsolata</string>
            <string language="en">More important questions of philosophy and theology of the era, characteristics of the secular culture: knight songs. The connection of religious music,lithurgy and literature</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">11. Század,  12. Század,  filozófia, Teológia,  skolasztika,  zene,  filozófia,  teológia,  irodalom,  </string>
            <string language="en">11. century, 12 century, philosophy, theology, scolastica, music, philosophy, theology, liturgy</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wichtigere Fragen der Philosophie und der 
Theologie der Ära, Eigenschaften der weltlichen Kultur: 
Ritterliede. Der Anschluß der frommen Musik, das lithurgy
und der Literatur</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des questions plus importantes de la philosophie 
et de la théologie de l'ère, caractéristiques de la culture 
séculaire : chansons de chevalier. La connexion de la 
musique religieuse, lithurgy et de la littérature</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Perguntas mais importantes da filosofia e do 
theology da era, características da cultura secular: canções 
do knight. A conexão da música religiosa, lithurgy e da 
literatura</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domande più importanti di filosofia e della 
teologia dell'era, caratteristiche della coltura secolare: 
canzoni del cavaliere. Il collegamento di musica 
religiosa, lithurgy e di letteratura</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημαντικότερα θέματα της φιλοσοφίας και της θεολογίας 
της εποχής, χαρακτηριστικά του κοσμικού πολιτισμού: 
τραγούδια ιπποτών. Η σύνδεση της θρησκευτικής 
μουσικής, lithurgy και της λογοτεχνίας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuestiones más importantes de la filosofía y de
la teología de la era, características de la cultura secular: 
canciones del caballero. El la conexión de la música 
religiosa, lithurgy y de la literatura</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">11. Jahrhundert, 12 Jahrhundert, Philosophie, 
Theologie, scolastica, Musik, Philosophie, Theologie, Liturgie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">11. siècle, 12 siècle, philosophie, théologie, 
scolastica, musique, philosophie, théologie, liturgie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">11. século, 12 século, filosofia, theology, 
scolastica, música, filosofia, theology, liturgy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">11. secolo, 12 secolo, filosofia, teologia, scolastica,
musica, filosofia, teologia, liturgy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">11, αιώνας, 12 αιώνας, φιλοσοφία, θεολογία, 
scolastica, μουσική, φιλοσοφία, θεολογία, λειτουργία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">11. siglo, 12 siglo, filosofía, teología, scolastica,
música, filosofía, teología, liturgia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">13-14</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:Kossuth Kiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>

        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
